name: HSP_ACCT_EBC_MMLAD
description: This table contains the mother's mailing address information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with associated electronic birth certificate information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number associated with mother's mailing address on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: EBC_MOM_MAIL_ADDR
columns.description: The mother's mailing address on the electronic birth certificate associated with the hospital account.
